regdb::talk

ensembl

Summary Package variables Synopsis General documentation Methods
Summary
analysis: Provides access to ensembl database both through ensembl API and direclty
Package variables top
No package variables defined.
Included modulestop
Bio::EnsEMBL::DBSQL::DBAdaptor
DBI
lib ' /home/sao/lib/perl5/site_perl/5.8.1 '
Synopsistop
Can be instantiated as part of regdb through regdb->talkto method and accessed through regdb->talk->(db methods)
or separately (see the docs for the new constructor method.
Keep in mind the environment and the database has to be set up correctly. This includes the ensembl_databases 
version management database.

No description!

ens_transcr_to_genecodetopprevnext


 Function : Gets the gene stable id for a given transcript stable id
            the index of the input array gives you index of the returned array you should get (see Usage)
 Usage   : my @genes=$ensdb->ens_transcr_to_gene(@tr);
            print 'For transcript ',$tr[4],' the gene is ',$genes[4]->[0],"\n";
 Returns : array of arrays
 Args    : array
 Warnings: 
 Notes  : 
 Todo   : Maybe return a hash, indexed by the transcript ids?




ens_transcripts_by_genecodetopprevnext


 Function : Gets the transcript stable ids for a given gene stable id
            the index of the input array gives you index of the returned array you should get (see Usage)
 Usage   : my @tr=$ensdb->ens_transcr_to_gene($gene);
            print 'For gene ',$gene,' the transcripts are ',join(',',@tr)"\n";
 Returns : array of arrays
 Args    : array
 Warnings: 
 Notes  : 
 Todo   : Maybe return a hash, indexed by the transcript ids?

count_refseq_trdescriptiontopprevnext

sub count_refseq_tr
 {
    my $ll=shift;
    my $ch=$self->{dbh}->prepare("select count(*) from ll_refseq_nm where ll_id=?")||die $DBI::errstr;
    $ch->execute($ll)  ||die $DBI::errstr;
    return $ch->fetchrow_array;
}




current_orgdescriptiontopprevnext

sub current_org
 {
	my $self=shift;
	return $self->{current_organism};
}




db_chooserdescriptiontopprevnext

sub db_chooser
 {
my ($self,$stableid)=@_;
$self->{ENSdbnchooser}->execute($stableid)||die;
my ($dbname,$org)=$self->{ENSdbnchooser}->fetchrow_array;
 my $host=$self->{ENShost};
 my $drv=$self->{ENSdrv}||'mysql';
my $ENScs="dbi:$drv:host=$host;sid=$dbname;database=$dbname;";

my $dbh=DBI($ENScs,$self->{ENSuser},$self->{ENSpass}) or die "connecting: $DBI::errstr" ;
$self->{ENScurrent}=$dbh;
$self->{ENScurrentname}=$dbname;
$self->{current_organism}=$org;
return $dbh;
}




ens_to_lldescriptiontopprevnext

sub ens_to_ll
 {
  ##MAKE $DB global and don't play with it anymore...my $id=shift;
my $organism=shift;
ORGN: {
	if (($organism eq 'mm') || ($organism =~ /Mus musculus/i) || ($id=~/MUS/)) {$org='mmusculus';	$db_ver='LocusLink'; last ORGN;}
	if (($organism eq 'rn') || ($organism =~ /Rattus norvegicus/i)  || ($id=~/RNOG/)) {$org='rnorvegicus';		$db_ver='LocusLink'; last ORGN;   }
	if (($organism eq 'dr') || ($organism =~ /Danio rerio/i)) {$org='drerio';	$db_ver='SWISSPROT'; last ORGN; }
	if (($organism eq 'fr') || ($organism =~ /Fugu rubripes/i)) {$org='frubripes';	$db_ver='RefSeq'; last ORGN; }
  if (($organism eq 'ag') || ($organism =~ /Anopheles gambiae/i)) {$org='agambiae';	$db_ver='SWISSPROT'; last ORGN; }
  if (($organism eq 'dm') || ($organism =~ /Drosophila melanogaster/i)) {$org='dmelanogaster';  $db_ver='SWISSPROT';  last ORGN; }
  $org='hsapiens';	$db_ver='LocusLink'; last ORGN;
}
my $dbtable=$org . '_ensemblgene_xref_' . $db_ver . "__dm";
 my $query="select dbprimary_id from  $dbtable  where gene_stable_id=? and dbprimary_id is not null";
 my $ens=$dbmart->prepare("$query") || die $dbmart->errstr;
 $ens->execute($id)|| die $dbmart->errstr;
  undef my $ensid;
 while ( $ensid=$ens->fetchrow_array) { last if (defined($ensid));
 }
 $ens->finish;
 return $ensid;
}




ens_to_lliddescriptiontopprevnext

sub ens_to_llid
 {
    my ($self,$in)=@_;
	    $in=~s/[^\d\w]//g;
        my $dbh=$self->{ENSdbmart};
        my $dbhcore=$self->db_chooser($in);
        my $org=$self->{current_organism};
        my ($s1,$s2)=split(/\s/,lc($org));
        my $s=substr($s1,0,1).$s2;
        my $dbtable=$s . '_gene_ensembl__xref_entrezgene___dm';
        my $handle=$dbh->prepare("select distinct dbprimary_id from $dbtable where genestable_id='$in'
                                    or transcript_stable_id='$in'")||die $DBI::errstr;
            $handle->execute||die;
    my $res=$handle->fetchrow_array;
     $self->{id}=$res;
     return $self->{id};
}




ens_transcr_to_genedescriptiontopprevnext

sub ens_transcr_to_gene
 {
my @accn;
my $self=shift;
my @ll= @_;
my @res;
my $str2 = "select a.stable_id from gene_stable_id a, transcript b, transcript_stable_id c
            where c.stable_id=? and c.transcript_id=b.transcript_id and b.gene_id=a.gene_id";
my $dbh=$self->db_chooser($ll);
$nm = $dbh->prepare($str2) ;
foreach my $query (@ll) {
    my @accn;
	$nm->execute($query);
	while (my $accn=$nm->fetchrow_array()) {
        push @accn,$accn;
    }
  push @res,\@accn;
}
  $nm->finish;
 return @res;
}




ens_transcripts_by_genedescriptiontopprevnext

sub ens_transcripts_by_gene
 {
my @accn;
my $self=shift;
my $ll= shift;
my @res;
my $str2 = "select c.stable_id from gene_stable_id a, transcript b, transcript_stable_id c
            where a.stable_id=? and c.transcript_id=b.transcript_id and b.gene_id=a.gene_id";
my $dbh=$self->db_chooser($ll);
$nm = $dbh->prepare($str2)||die ;
foreach my $query (@ll) {
    my @accn;
	$nm->execute($query)||die;
	while (my $accn=$nm->fetchrow_array()) {
        push @accn,$accn;
    }
  push @res,\@accn;
}
  $nm->finish;
 return @res;
}




get_ens_adaptordescriptiontopprevnext

sub get_ens_adaptor
 {
my $self=shift;
my $host=$self->{ENShost};
$self->{ENScurrentadaptor}= new Bio::EnsEMBL::DBSQL::DBAdaptor(-host => $host, -user =>$self->{ENSuser}, -dbname =>
                    $self->{ENScurrentname},-pass=>$self->{ENSpass});
return $self->{ENScurrentadaptor};
}




get_ens_chrdescriptiontopprevnext

sub get_ens_chr
 {
my ($self,$ens)=@_;
my $db=$self->db_chooser($ens);
my $q1=$db->prepare("select d.name,a.version,seq_region_start,seq_region_end,seq_region_strand
                    from coord_system a, transcript b, transcript_stable_id c, seq_region d
                    where a.name='chromosome' and d.seq_region_id=b.seq_region_id and
                    a.coord_system_id=d.coord_system_id and b.transcript_id=c.transcript_id 
                    and c.stable_id='$ens'")||die;
$q1->execute||die;
my ($chr,$build,$start,$end,$strand)=$q1->fetchrow_array;
unless ($chr) {
    my $q2=$db->prepare("select d.name,a.version,seq_region_start,seq_region_end,seq_region_strand
                    from coord_system a, gene b, gene_stable_id c, seq_region d
                    where a.name='chromosome' and d.seq_region_id=b.seq_region_id and
                    a.coord_system_id=d.coord_system_id and b.gene_id=c.gene_id 
                    and c.stable_id='$ens'")||die;
    $q2->execute||die;
    ($chr,$build,$start,$end,$strand)=$q2->fetchrow_array;
}
return $chr,$build,$start,$end,$strand;
}




get_ensembl_dbnamesdescriptiontopprevnext

sub get_ensembl_dbnames
 {
my $edbnh=shift;
my $sel=$edbnh->prepare("use ensembl_databases")||die "Couldn't prepare the select st";
my @res;
$sel->execute||die;
my $droplist=$edbnh->prepare("select distinct db_name from ens_dbnames where current= 'yes'")||die "Couldn't prepare the droplist statement\n";
 $droplist->execute||die "Couldn't execute droplist: ",$DBI::errstr,"\n";
my @all=@{$droplist->fetchall_arrayref};
foreach my $row (@all) {
	push @res,$row->[0];
}
return @res;
}

my ($self,@in)=@_;

get_transcript_numberdescriptiontopprevnext

sub get_transcript_number
 {
    my ($self,$in)=@_;
    $in=~s/[^\d\w]//g;
	 my $dbh=$self->db_chooser($in);
        my $handle=$dbh->prepare(" $in")||die $DBI::errstr;
}




go_to_lldescriptiontopprevnext

sub go_to_ll
 {
    my ($self,$in)=@_;
    my @ll=regdb::talk::GKDB::go_to_ll($self->{dbh},$in);
    return @ll;
}




llid_to_accndescriptiontopprevnext

sub llid_to_accn
 {
    my ($self,@in)=@_;
    foreach my $in (@in) {
	    $in=~s/[^\d\w]//g;
    }
       my @res=regdb::talk::GKDB::ll2accn($self->{dbh},@in);
     $self->{id}=\@ res;
     return $self->{id};
}




llid_to_ensdescriptiontopprevnext

sub llid_to_ens
 {
   my ($self,@in)=@_;
   my $res;
   die "No organism defined, EnsMART cannot do this cross-species query!" unless ($self->{USERmarttable});
   my $table=$self->{USERmarttable} . '_gene_ensembl__xref_entrezgene__dm';
   my $handle=$self->{ENSdbmart}->prepare("select gene_stable_id from $table where dbprimary_id=?")||die;
   foreach my $in (@in) {
	$in=~s/\D//g;
	$handle->execute($in)||die;
	push @ids,$handle->fetchrow_array;
	if ($##ids>0) {
		warn "Multiple ids retrieved for $in!";
		push @res,\@ids;
		next;
	}
	push @res,\@ids;
}

llid_to_hgncdescriptiontopprevnext

sub llid_to_hgnc
 {
    my ($self,@in)=@_;
   my $res;
   die "No organism defined, EnsMART cannot do this cross-species query!" unless ($self->{USERmarttable});
   my $table1=$self->{USERmarttable} . '_gene_ensembl__xref_entrezgene__dm';
   my $table2=$self->{USERmarttable} . '_gene_ensembl__xref_hugo__dm'; ##Not exactly HGNC, but should do for now
   my $handle=$self->{ENSdbmart}->prepare("select b.dbprimary_id from $table1 a, $table2 b 
					where a.dbprimary_id=? and a.gene_stable_id=b.gene_stable_id")||die;
   foreach my $in (@in) {
	$in=~s/\D//g;
	$handle->execute($in)||die;
	push @ids,$handle->fetchrow_array;
	if ($##ids>0) {
		warn "Multiple ids retrieved for $in!";
		push @res,\@ids;
		next;
	}
	push @res,\@ids;
}

sub llid_to_mim
 {
       my ($self,@in)=@_;
   my $res;
   die "No organism defined, EnsMART cannot do this cross-species query!" unless ($self->{USERmarttable});
   my $table1=$self->{USERmarttable} . '_gene_ensembl__xref_entrezgene__dm';
   my $table2=$self->{USERmarttable} . '_gene_ensembl__xref_mim__dm'; 
   my $handle=$self->{ENSdbmart}->prepare("select b.dbprimary_id from $table1 a, $table2 b 
					where a.dbprimary_id=? and a.gene_stable_id=b.gene_stable_id")||die;
   foreach my $in (@in) {
	$in=~s/\D//g;
	$handle->execute($in)||die;
	push @ids,$handle->fetchrow_array;
	if ($##ids>0) {
		warn "Multiple ids retrieved for $in!";
		push @res,\@ids;
		next;
	}
	push @res,@ids;
}




llid_to_nmdescriptiontopprevnext

sub llid_to_nm
 {
     my ($self,@in)=@_;
   my $res;
   die "No organism defined, EnsMART cannot do this cross-species query!" unless ($self->{USERmarttable});
   my $table1=$self->{USERmarttable} . '_gene_ensembl__xref_entrezgene__dm';
   my $table2=$self->{USERmarttable} . '_gene_ensembl__xref_refseq_dna__dm'; ##Am I sure this is what we want here??? Do tests!
   my $handle=$self->{ENSdbmart}->prepare("select b.dbprimary_id from $table1 a, $table2 b 
					where a.dbprimary_id=? and a.gene_stable_id=b.gene_stable_id")||die;
   foreach my $in (@in) {
	$in=~s/\D//g;
	$handle->execute($in)||die;
	push @ids,$handle->fetchrow_array;
	if ($##ids>0) {
		warn "Multiple ids retrieved for $in!";
		push @res,\@ids;
		next;
	}
	push @res,\@ids;
}




llid_to_npdescriptiontopprevnext

sub llid_to_np
 {
   my ($self,@in)=@_;
	  foreach my $in (@in) {
	$in=~s/[^\d\w]//g;
    }
     push @{$self->{id}},regdb::talk::GKDB::getnp($self->{dbh},@in);
     return @{$self->{id}};
}




llid_to_orgdescriptiontopprevnext

sub llid_to_org
 {
    my ($self,@in)=@_;
    foreach my $in (@in) {
	    $in=~s/[^\d\w]//g;
    }
       my @res=regdb::talk::GKDB::ll2org($self->{dbh},@in);
     $self->{id}=\@ res;
     return $self->{id};
}

llid_to_sprotdescriptiontopprevnext

sub llid_to_sprot
 {
   my ($self,@in)=@_;
   my $res;
   die "No organism defined, EnsMART cannot do this cross-species query!" unless ($self->{USERmarttable});
   my $table1=$self->{USERmarttable} . '_gene_ensembl__xref_entrezgene__dm';
   my $table2=$self->{USERmarttable} . '_gene_ensembl__xref_uniprot_accession__dm'; ##Am I sure this is what we want here??? Do tests!
   my $handle=$self->{ENSdbmart}->prepare("select b.dbprimary_id from $table1 a, $table2 b 
					where a.dbprimary_id=? and a.gene_stable_id=b.gene_stable_id")||die;
   foreach my $in (@in) {
	$in=~s/\D//g;
	$handle->execute($in)||die;
	push @ids,$handle->fetchrow_array;
	if ($##ids>0) {
		warn "Multiple ids retrieved for $in!";
		push @res,\@ids;
		next;
	}
	push @res,@ids;
}

sub llid_to_uni
 {

   my $table2=$self->{USERmarttable} . '_gene_ensembl__xref_unigene_accession__dm'; ##Am I sure this is what we want here??? Do tests!
   my $handle=$self->{ENSdbmart}->prepare("select b.dbprimary_id from $table1 a, $table2 b 
					where a.dbprimary_id=? and a.gene_stable_id=b.gene_stable_id")||die;
   foreach my $in (@in) {
	$in=~s/\D//g;
	$handle->execute($in)||die;
	push @ids,$handle->fetchrow_array;
	if ($##ids>0) {
		warn "Multiple ids retrieved for $in!";
		push @res,\@ids;
		next;
	}
	push @res,@ids;
}




newdescriptiontopprevnext

sub new
 {
 my ($class,%params)=@_;

 my $drv=$params{DRV}||'mysql';
 my $pass=$params{PASS}||'';
 my $host=$params{HOST}||'localhost';
 my $user=$params{USER}||'';
 my $add=$params{ADD}||'';
 my $uorg=$params{organism}||'none';
## print "User: $user";
my $ENScs="dbi:$drv:host=$host;sid=ensembl_databases;database=ensembl_databases;";

my $dbh1=DBI($ENScs,$user,$pass) or die "connecting: $DBI::errstr" ;
$self->{ENSmanager}=$dbh1;
my @dbnames=get_ensembl_dbnames($dbh1);
my ($mart,@dupl)=grep(/ensembl_mart/,@dbnames);
die unless ($mart);
my $martcs="dbi:$drv:host=$host;sid=$mart;database=$mart;";
my ($self,%core);
my $dbhmart=DBI($martcs,$user,$pass) or die "connecting: $DBI::errstr $martcs" ;
my $dbnchoser=$dbh1->prepare("select db_name, a.organism from ens_dbnames a, stable_org b where a.organism=b.organism and b.stable_id=?
                                and a.current='yes'")||die;
$self->{ENShost}=$host;
$self->{ENSdrv}=$drv;
$self->{ENSuser}=$user;
$self->{ENSpass}=$pass;
$self->{ENSdbnchooser}=$dbnchoser;
$self->{ENSdbmart}=$dbhmart;
$self->{USERorg}=$uorg;
if ($uorg ne 'none') {
	my ($morg1,$morg2)=split(/\s/,$uorg);
	my $mtable=lc(substr($morg1,0,1) . $morg2);
	$self->{USERmarttable}=$mtable;
}
$self->{USERmartorg}=$uorg;
                                
=obsolete
foreach my $dbr (@dbnames) {
my $dbname=$dbr->[0];
next unless ($dbname=~/core/);
 ENSDB: { 
	if ($dbname=~/homo_sapiens/) {$core{'Homo sapiens'}=$dbname; $self->{ensorg}='Homo sapiens'; last ENSDB;}
	if ($dbname=~/mus_musculus/) {$core{'Mus musculus'}=$dbname;  $self->{ensorg}='Mus musculus'; last ENSDB;}
	if ($dbname=~/rattus_norvegicus/) {$core{'Rattus norvegicus'}=$dbname;  $self->{ensorg}='Rattus norvegicus'; last ENSDB;}
	if ($dbname=~/danio_rerio/) {$core{'Danio rerio'}=$dbname;  $self->{ensorg}='Danio rerio'; last ENSDB;}
	if ($dbname=~/anopheles_gambiae/) {$core{'Anopheles gambiae'}=$dbname;  $self->{ensorg}='Anopheles gambiae'; last ENSDB;}
	if ($dbname=~/fugu_rubripes/) {$core{'Fugu rubripes'}=$dbname;  $self->{ensorg}='Fugu rubripes'; last ENSDB;}
	if ($dbname=~/drosophila_melanogaster/) {$core{'Drosophila melanogaster'}=$dbname;  $self->{ensorg}='Drosophila melanogaster'; last ENSDB;}
}
}
my $determ;
if ($drv eq 'ORACLE') { $determ='sid';}
else { $determ='database';}
my $db=$core{$params{ORG}};

$self->{dbh}=DBI("dbi:mysql:host=$host;$determ=$db",$user,$pass) or die "connecting: $DBI::errstr" ;
$self->{adaptor}= new Bio::EnsEMBL::DBSQL::DBAdaptor(-host => $host, -user => $user, -dbname =>
                    $core{$params{ORG}},-pass=>$pass);
##print Dumper($self->{adaptor});
=cut

bless( $self,$class);
return $self;
}




nm_to_lliddescriptiontopprevnext

sub nm_to_llid
 {
         my ($self,@in)=@_;
   my $res;
   die "No organism defined, EnsMART cannot do this cross-species query!" unless ($self->{USERmarttable});
   my $table2=$self->{USERmarttable} . '_gene_ensembl__xref_entrezgene__dm';
   my $table1=$self->{USERmarttable} . '_gene_ensembl__xref_refseq_dna__dm'; 
   my $handle=$self->{ENSdbmart}->prepare("select b.dbprimary_id from $table1 a, $table2 b 
					where a.dbprimary_id=? and a.gene_stable_id=b.gene_stable_id")||die;
   foreach my $in (@in) {
	$in=~s/\D//g;
	$handle->execute($in)||die;
	push @ids,$handle->fetchrow_array;
	if ($##ids>0) {
		warn "Multiple ids retrieved for $in!";
		push @res,\@ids;
		next;
	}
	push @res,@ids;
}




swissprot_to_lliddescriptiontopprevnext

sub swissprot_to_llid
 {
      my ($self,@in)=@_;
   my $res;
   die "No organism defined, EnsMART cannot do this cross-species query!" unless ($self->{USERmarttable});
   my $table2=$self->{USERmarttable} . '_gene_ensembl__xref_entrezgene__dm';
   my $table1=$self->{USERmarttable} . '_gene_ensembl__xref_uniprot_accession__dm'; 
   my $handle=$self->{ENSdbmart}->prepare("select b.dbprimary_id from $table1 a, $table2 b 
					where a.dbprimary_id=? and a.gene_stable_id=b.gene_stable_id")||die;
   foreach my $in (@in) {
	$in=~s/\D//g;
	$handle->execute($in)||die;
	push @ids,$handle->fetchrow_array;
	if ($##ids>0) {
		warn "Multiple ids retrieved for $in!";
		push @res,\@ids;
		next;
	}
	push @res,@ids;
}




symbol_to_lliddescriptiontopprevnext

sub symbol_to_llid
 {
    my ($self,@in)=@_;
    foreach my $in (@in) {
	chomp $in;
	$in=~s/[^\d\w]//g;
	my @x=regdb::talk::GKDB::sym_to_ll($self->{dbh},@in);
     push @{$self->{res}},join(",",@x);
      return @{$self->{res}};##($self->{dbh},$in);
    }
}
